name: AWS S3 Events, Alerts
mapping: AWS S3 Events, Alerts Default Mappings
description: This plugin is used to send Netskope Alerts (DLP, Malware, Policy, Compromised Credential, Malsite, Quarantine, Remediation, Security Assessment, Watchlist, UBA, CTEP, Device, and Content) and Events (Page, Application, Audit, Infrastructure, Network, Incident, Endpoint and Client Status) logs to the specified AWS S3 bucket. Note: This plugin is designed to send only JSON formatted data to S3 bucket.

configuration.label: Authentication Method
configuration.description: Select the method to be used for AWS client authentication.
